mosinstall.name: TitleLink
mosinstall.author: Tobias Gesellchen, Marc Perkel
mosinstall.description:
Content Plugin for easy creation of hyperlinks (Joomla! 1.0.x).

Easily create links within your content, extendible by plugins.

After initial installation, your new TitleLink plugin is not yet active. To activate it, go to the Mambot Manager and click on publish to activate this mambot.

How to use inside an article:

  • Just use the command {ln:<phrase>} to create a link using the given <phrase>.
  • You may use the command {ln:<phrase> '<title>} to create a link like above but with the given <title>.
  • The command {ln:nw:<phrase> '<title>} creates a link which opens in a new window.

Further documentation with examples can be found here.

To get further help, feel free to contact the author at tobias@gesellix.de.
